overview: After school, Ayara (17) invites Jerek (17) to a birthday party invitation given by one of her classmates. Arriving at the party, Ayara and Jerek were surprised by the free style of the party. Then when a man wanted to harass Ayara, Jerek got lost and a commotion ensued, Jerek was then beaten and ended up dying. All scenes of violence were recorded clearly on Ayara's handycam. However, when Ayara tried to hand over the evidence, Ayara was followed by the perpetrators of Jerek's murder who were after the evidence.
title: Jerek's Last Party
